During the current year, the Sterlite Interlinks Limited has given loan to its Holding Company, Sterlite Electric Limited ('SEL') for general corporate purposes, amounting to Rs.600.00 million out of which Rs.500.00 million has been repaid. The outstanding balance of loan has been transferred to Sterlite Grid 5 Limited ('SGL5') pursuant to "Scheme of Arrangement" (refer note 51A for details).
The loan carries interest at 10.00% p.a. payable at the time of principal repayment and is repayable in 3 years from the date of disbursement.
